channel.title: I-Doser - ~!Drugs!~
channel.description:
Download link: http://i-doser.com Please read
Well, I have known this program for a while, it basically is this program, what allows you listen to different drug files, it has the affect as the drug would if it were real, and they come in a variety's.
You're meant to download it at their site, and you get 2 free drug files, (Alcohol, content) they make you buy the other drug files at your own will.
But I torrented one were you get all of the drug files that there are at http://www.i-doser.com/store/
Basically what you need to do, is plug in HEADPHONES (THIS WONT WORK WITHOUT HEADPHONES), turn on a drug file, and RELAX, preferably lie down in your bed so you get absolutely no interruptions, this is 100% FREE AND LEGAL.
Try and use at your own will, remember start off with something that isn't to strong, and work your way up.
Oh and a side note, don't do "Hand of God" until you've tried and are comfortable with the program, because, well, read the feedbacks at (http://i-doser.com)
Enjoy :)
(LINK IS BROKEN AND FILE DELETED)
Try to torrent it, not that hard, or use google :X
[IMG]http://i4.tinypic.com/7wjo4rr.png[/img]

item.description:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:106, topic:169378”][quote author=Silver Lining link=topic=229080.msg2157209#msg2157209 date=1207219131]

can you reupload please? i saw on ares theres an orgasm one and ive always thought girls get better then guys so ill just have to see lol
[/quote]How would sound make you experience a GIRL’s orgasm? IF it made you orgasm, it’d be the same one you get as a male - that is, if it’s any different in a woman anyway.

Yes, men moan and scream during sex. Do you mean feeling or behavior? Either way, I doubt it works.[/quote]Ha, I assure you, I moan and scream during masturbation. Even worse, I kick my walls. Rictoo is similar. Don’t believe that bullshit story he tells about the hole he punched in his wall, because it’s a lie. It was really just the result of the best fap of his life.

Read full topic

item.title: I-Doser - ~!Drugs!~
item.dc:creator: @markkevin markkevin
item.description:
@markkevin wrote:

I got to agree in some parts tho.As they have vote in forums “Does i-doser work?” some of the doses work and some not.Descriptions are mostly lies but im satisfied.
Doses you tried aren’t anything special.Only one of them that actually worked was lucid dream.Hand of god just made me feel very, very bad and LSD was bullshit.Only some sound distortion(I almost shit myself when heard like someone’s in my room),I’m really disappointed.
Try Hash and MarijuanaQH worked fine for me.

Read full topic

item.title: I-Doser - ~!Drugs!~
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“markkevin, post:88, topic:169378”]Well then really you probably didn’t even try…
Real drugs eh? I’m not going further from weed
Try smoking real marijuana and listening to dose works much better(i tried).[/quote]

No I’ve tried 3 different doses(lucid dreaming, LSD, and hand of god). And I did them exactly how you are supposed to. I lied down in the dark on my bed, and kept my mind clear from any other thoughts.

Sorry for coming off as such an asshole. I just seriously don’t believe this works the way people think it does. I believe in the theory of binaural beats, but I don’t think this program is able to give off any noticable effects. I honestly think i-doser is a scam as well. Have you read the descriptions of the doses? It’s pure lies.

Read full topic

item.title: I-Doser - ~!Drugs!~
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:87, topic:169378”][quote author=markkevin link=topic=229080.msg2096174#msg2096174 date=1205018318]
Well l2focus then.
EDIT:Oh i just read it doesn’t work for certain people.
[/quote]

Yeah, it only works for the weak minded. You can go get high off your placebo effect,

I’ll stick to real drugs which produce real effects.

And why would it only work for some people? The brain waves this produce would be the same for everyone. Theta waves are not going to be a a significant different frequency for the vast majority of people, etc. You know, there are a lot of people who still think banana peels can get you high. There’s different versions of the rumour, some saying there is LSD and others say “bananadine.” People sometimes swear they get high off it, but this is just placebo.[/quote]I smoke pure bananadine every day, fucker.

Read full topic
